education.desc: Currently I am studying coding at Life Choices Academy
I graduated at Harry Gwala Secondary School with a bachelor's pass in 2018.
I finished primary school back in 2013 at Injongo Primary School.

experience.desc: I currently enrolled at Life Choices Academy where I'm receiving skills and experience to become a web developer in the near future.
As a side hustle I am fixing people's cellphones whether it be FRP bypass, WhatsApp updates or bypassing security on most Android phones excluding IOS.

testimonials.name: John Bruce
testimonials.testimony: I highly recommend Abenathi for web development. His skills, dedication, and eagerness to learn are impressive. He has a keen eye for design, a strong grasp of programming languages, and excels at problem-solving. Abenathi is committed to achieving outstanding results. I wholeheartedly endorse him!

testimonials.name: Cheslyn Herman
testimonials.testimony: Abenathi is a great person to work with. He is a selfless person who strives for team effort. Being part of his team allows you to work better under pressure as she ensures to always help where its needed.

testimonials.name: Ethan Lesar
testimonials.testimony: I have had the pleasure of working with Abenathi, and I must say that he is one of the most respectful and considerate individuals I have ever met. Despite being quieter in nature, his contributions to the team are invaluable.

testimonials.name: Okuhle Gxotiwe
testimonials.testimony: His dedication to his work is truly commendable. He approaches every task with a strong sense of commitment and a genuine enthusiasm to excel. One of his standout qualities is his unwavering determination to continually enhance his skills.

testimonials.name: Xola Bangaza
testimonials.testimony: Abenathi is an enthusiastic person, who is always willing to improve upon his mistakes. He's constantly interacting with other people, learning different skills each day and often-times shares his skills with his colleagues at work. There's hardly ever an unpleasant moment when he's around and he is a constant source of joy in the workplace.

testimonials.name: Waydin Jochem
testimonials.testimony: Abenathi's got this great knack for learning and he's always up for fine-tuning his skills. He's a real people-person, constantly picking up new tricks of the trade and happily passing them on to his work buddies.
